section.title: Using the API
section.para: For a documentation of the API defined in JSR-283 please have a look at the specification at http://jcp.org/en/jsr/detail?id=283

section.title: Using the web-based CR admin
section.para:
The TYPO3 CR comes with a web-based administration interface. Currently it allows you to
look at the node hierarchy
properties of nodes
delete nodes
More features will follow.
To access the admin interface you need to call http://host/typo3cr/ in the standard FLOW3 distribution. For customized setups the routing may be configured differently.

section.title: Using the FLOW3 persistence backend
section.para: The backend has no user serviceable parts inside, just have a look at the FLOW3 documentation to learn more about the persistence subpackage.
